title: What would you say is Batman’s most impressive gadget? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy, his S+tier gadgets are the most impressive. just for demonstration: high explosive pellets that destroy the tendrils of Z, an alien WMD(JLA: Classified #12)  Explosives blow off a limb of a Manhunter(Green Lantern (2005) #3)  Micro Plastique charge that blew up another Manhunter(Batman (1940) #415   Other impressive Bat-Gadgets that i love as well: "super smelling salts"(JLA #86)  Fear Gas(Detective Comics (2016) #985)   Kryptonite Batarang Electric Fisticuffs(Batman Incorporated (2011) #1)   Gauntlets that fire out energy blast that pierce through Deathstrokes suit that’s made out of “Promethium Chain Mail”(Deathstroke (2016) #34)  I’ll also stress to say that the shark repellent that you saw in The Batman TV show with Adam West is not an actual gadget of Batman, it was stored inside the helicopter Robin was flying and not Batmans utility belt therefore it doesn’t count.  although it is cool, and you can count it if you like but i personally don’t.

The Cape.. Whether the “normal” size mid-calve length or Spector-like flying drapes that billow over his head yet hid his feet, that is an impressive article of clothing, and seems to be essential to his frightening persona. I don’t substantiate the answer, it just is
